critique:
The bars are not taped together, they are sperated instead.
At least three events were missed:
(1) People talk to the camera initially.
(2) People put tabs on the bars.
(3) People use tools to trim off the excess paint.

temporal.caption: A person is spray painting bars that are taped together different colors.
They put a sticker of words onto the bars.

captions.full: A person is spray painting bars that are taped together different colors. They put a sticker of words onto the bars.
